value.title: Add or Edit Columns When Importing Data from Analysis Services into Power BI
value.excerpt: If you use SQL Server Analysis Services as a data source for Power BI, you have two types of connection; Live Connection or Import Data. value.title: Power BI Dataflow vs Data Warehouse   Which one to choose

value.title: Power BI DAX RelatedTable Function   Get the subtable related to the current row
value.excerpt: There are multiple functions that can help when you work with tables that are connected through relationships. One of these functions is Relatedtable.
